scripts.formulas: tsx scripts/extract-formulas.ts --file '5 YEAR FINANCIAL FORECAST.xlsx' --sheet 'PERSONAL BUDGET 2026-2027'
scripts.export:xlsx:json: tsx scripts/export-xlsx.ts --file '5 YEAR FINANCIAL FORECAST.xlsx' --format json --out data/forecast.json
scripts.export:xlsx:csv: tsx scripts/export-xlsx.ts --file '5 YEAR FINANCIAL FORECAST.xlsx' --format csv --out data/forecast.csv
